info.name: E-commerce API
info.description: Postman collection for Laravel E-commerce API

request.description: This API will fetch user details where auth token generated by user which we are sending in the request, if we use different auth token and different user id the give error message
Adding the customer id to specific user which we send auth tekone
Using the auth token fetch the user id and for that user orders fetch and send in the json format.

item.name: Assigning cart ids to logged in users

request.description: Assigning the cart ids to user id who logged in after cart add, we assign using the auth token take user id and assign cart ids to user_id

response.name: Unprocessable content (Incorrect current password)
Unprocessable content (New password does not follow the password rules)
Unprocessable content (New password and current password must be different)

request.description: Forgot password send email link to customer email
After email send for code confirmation we need to send code, email id and techmology as app, it will confirm code.
After code confirmation we need to reset the password with new password, we need to send new password, confirm password and email id with this API.
Get all users for admin pannel
Soft delete of user from user table
Complete Delete of soft deleted users use this API
Update user from admin using auth token

item.name: Get all orders with address and items

request.description: https://api.sartree.com/api/v1/admin/orders?user_id=5 this is for particular user orders, https://api.sartree.com/api/v1/admin/orders this will get all orders from admin
Update the order status, we can add payment_details if we want to update payment_details
if we pass ?user_id then it will give particular user address details otherwise it will display all addresses
